Title: Message from [Company Name] Authorised Representative
Subject: Required Attention: [Department Name], Our Important Notice!

Dear All,

As a matter of urgency, we must advise you on some important matters regarding our company. As a general rule, all authorised representatives (ARs) have been informed of the following:

1. The Board of Directors of [Company Name] has authorised us to initiate a merger and acquisition bid for our company with [Company Name] (acquirer). The closing date for this acquisition is on [Date], and a total capital injection of [Amount] will be provided by our company.
